verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%> which <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> be to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> who hath <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G2129>blessings<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> places <S%G1722>in<s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

According <S%G2531>as<s%> he hath <S%G1586>chosen<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> that <S%G2248>we<s%> should <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G299>blame<s%> <S%G2714>before<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> love: <S%G26><s%>

Having <S%G4309>predestinated<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the adoption of <S%G5206>children<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G848>himself,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> good <S%G2107>pleasure<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%>

To <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> he hath made us <S%G5487>accepted<s%> <S%G2248><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G25>beloved.<s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G629>redemption<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G3900>sins,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace;<s%>
Wherein <S%G3739><s%> he hath <S%G4052>abounded<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5428>prudence;<s%>

Having made <S%G1107>known<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G848>his<s%> good <S%G2107>pleasure<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he hath <S%G4388>purposed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> himself: <S%G848><s%>

That <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3622>dispensation<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of <S%G2540>times<s%> he might gather together in <S%G346>one<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth;<s%> even <S%G1722>in<s%> him: <S%G846><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we have obtained an <S%G2820>inheritance,<s%> being <S%G4309>predestinated<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4286>purpose<s%> of him who <S%G1754>worketh<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of his <S%G848>own<s%> will: <S%G2307><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> trusted, after that ye <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4991>salvation:<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> after that ye <S%G4100>believed,<s%> ye were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> with that <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G1860>promise,<s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G728>earnest<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G1519>until<s%> the <S%G629>redemption<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> purchased <S%G4047>possession,<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G2504>also,<s%> after I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G5209>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%>

Cease <S%G3973><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4335>prayers,<s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G1391>glory,<s%> may <S%G1325>give<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of him: <S%G848><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1271>understanding<s%> being <S%G5461>enlightened;<s%> that <S%G5209>ye<s%> may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2821>calling,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5235>exceeding<s%> <S%G3174>greatness<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2248>us-ward<s%> who <S%G4100>believe,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1753>working<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> mighty <S%G2904>power,<s%> <S%G2479><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G1754>wrought<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> when he <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2523>set<s%> him <S%G1722>at<s%> his <S%G848>own<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> places,

And <S%G2532><s%> hath <S%G5293>put<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to be the <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G5228>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church,<s%>
